tasks.instruction:
Create a clickable prototype of the Career Guidance Assistant app based on the uploaded UI design sample at /workspace/uploads/UI FINAL.JPG. The prototype should include:

1. All screens shown in the sample: Welcome, Login, Sign Up, Career Dashboard, Payment, Assessment Form, Statistics, and Profile
2. Dark-themed, modern, corporate design that's also student-friendly
3. Blue and green gradient color palette as shown in the sample
4. Modern sans-serif typography
5. Clean, educational, and inspiring design
6. Interactive navigation between screens
7. Responsive design that works on mobile and desktop
8. Career recommendation dashboard with cards
9. Payment modal functionality
10. Simple, student-friendly user flow

Use Shadcn-ui, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS to build this interactive prototype. Make sure the design closely matches the uploaded sample image and includes smooth transitions between screens. The prototype should be fully clickable and demonstrate the complete user journey from welcome to profile management.
